pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parallel Digital Soil Mapping using Machine Learning // Parallel computing, multi-core CPU is used to efficiently compute and process multi-dimensional soil data.This package includes the parallelized Quantile Regression Forests algorithm for Digital Soil Mapping and is mainly dependent on the package 'quantregForest' and 'snowfall'. Detailed references to the R package and the web site are described in the methods, as detailed in the method documentation.
